protocol.text: Analysis was performed using the affylmaGUI R package (Wettenhall et al, 2006). Robust Muti-array Analysis (RMA) algorithm was used for background correction, normalization and expression levels summarization (Irizarry et al., 2003). ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA Log2 Signal intensity
Trizol extraction of total RNA and cleanup with RNeasy (Qiagen), according to the manufacturers's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 3 ug total RNA
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip ATH1 Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
Each microarray was scanned at 2.5 ï¾µm resolution in a GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G System (Affymetrix)
